# bog bush
The leading ğœ áµá»§ hypothesis is stronger than the dangling áµ¡á»§ / á»§á¶´ kh / sh hypothesis

One ancestral reading compatible with all the evidence would be

ğœ ğ“‡ ğ“‡ bogÊ°
ğœ áµá»§á¶´ bush Buxbaum ğŒ±ğŒ°ğŒ²ğŒ¼ğƒ	bagms
ğœ áµá»§áµ¡ Buche Birke birch foxtail?
ğœ áµá»§áµ¡ box â‰ˆ ğ“Šª ğ‘€© ğ’‡¥ 
ğœ áµá»§áµ¡ â€¢bukh â€¢bugh > á»§êœ¥ á»§êœ£ á»§êœ¤ á»§Ê¿ á»§êœ‚ > Ø£ÙÙ…Ù‘ Ê”u

# Semitic realization
In any case the dangling á»§áµ¡ clearly moved to the front áµ¡á»§ as in 
ğœğğš áµ¡á»§mt 	#kimtu ×—××•×œ×” khamÃºla 

Or rather, in the Ugaritic alphabet was ambiguous in consonantal CV/VC readings.
